p: The 2 D diagrams for interactions of compounds 5g and 5h in InhA active site ( Figure S1), and the 3 D illustrations of the superimposition for the docking poses and the co-crystalized ligands in DprE1 and InhA active sites ( Figure S2), as well as the detailed interactions achieved by compounds 5g and 5h within the DprE1 binding site ( Table S3) were provided in the Supporting Materials.
